text: Hichem Djait (), (December 6, 1935 - June 1, 2021) was a Tunisian historian and scholar of Islam. Djait was born in Tunis, Tunisia. He was a Emeritus Professor at the University of Tunis. He was also a visiting professor at the McGill University and the University of California at Berkeley. Djait was a specialist in Medieval Islamic history, he was member of the International Scientific Institute for the General History of Africa edited by the UNESCO. == References == Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tunisian writers Category:Historians Category:Tunisian academics Category:People from Tunis
title: Hichem Djait
